healpgood.midnightconfig.title: HealPGood Configs
healpgood.midnightconfig.var1: Percent Chance a Mob Drops a Heart, will multiply by Entity Health if Entity Health is true
healpgood.midnightconfig.var2: Percent Chance a Boss Mob Drops a Heart, will multiply by Entity Health / 2 if Entity Health is true
healpgood.midnightconfig.var3: Minimum amount of Hearts a Mob can drop
healpgood.midnightconfig.var4: Maximum amount of Hearts a Mob can drop
healpgood.midnightconfig.var5: Minimum amount of Hearts a Boss Mob can drop
healpgood.midnightconfig.var6: Maximum amount of Hearts a Boss Mob can drop
healpgood.midnightconfig.var7: Amount of Health a mob needs to drop hearts like a Boss Mob
healpgood.midnightconfig.var8: Mobs added to this list will act as Boss Mobs even if they don't have the Health necessary to classify as one
healpgood.midnightconfig.var9: Determines if Drop Chance is effected by Mob Health
healpgood.midnightconfig.var10: Determines how many Hearts a Heart Crystal rewards the Player
healpgood.midnightconfig.var11: Determines how much Health you can get from Heart Crystals before they stop working
healpgood.midnightconfig.var12: Determines how many Hearts a Heart Container rewards the Player
healpgood.midnightconfig.var13: Determines how much Health you can get from Heart Containers before they stop working
healpgood.midnightconfig.var14: Determines if Hearts are more frequent on Valentines Day
